name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **machine learning**, **speech synthesis**, and **neural TTS** applications. Expertise in **Python**, **PyTorch**, and orchestration tools such as **Kubeflow** and **MLflow**, with a strong focus on developing **multilingual modeling** and **voice cloning** solutions. Proven track record in implementing **ASR** (Automatic Speech Recognition) systems, leveraging advanced **LLM-based approaches** for enhanced voice processing capabilities.
Experienced in building applications that integrate **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for scalable deployments, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. Well-versed in data management using technologies like **PostgreSQL**, **Kafka**, and **Redis**, with a strong understanding of data formats such as **Parquet** and optimizations with **ONNX** and **TensorRT** for inference speeds.
Excels in aligning development efforts with compliance requirements and developing AI/ML-powered platforms that focus on predictive analytics and automation. A collaborative team player dedicated to leveraging technology to shape innovative and efficient solutions.
